<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Reliable Squire](/Feats.aspx?ID=3624) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 82

**Access**
Knights of Lastwall have access to this feat.

</column>

---

You know the path to victory isn't traveled alone, and you lend aid to your companions whenever you can. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=75). If you roll a critical failure on a check to Aid, you get a failure instead.
